<< blackman Signal Processing db2pow >>

db2mag

Convert a gain in decibels (dB) to a magnitude.

Syntax

mag = db2mag(db)

Input argument

db

input array: scalar, vector or matrix.

Output argument

mag

corresponding magnitude

Description

mag = db2mag(db) returns corresponding magnitude.

Example

mag = db2mag([0, -20])

See also

mag2db.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET

<< blackman Signal Processing db2pow >>
